explains: n. 放映机，投影仪；探照灯；计划者，规划者
wordGroup: overhead projector n. 高射投影仪
slide projector 幻灯机，幻灯片放映机
projector lamp 投射灯，放影灯

sentences.en: Our host ran a long extension cord out from the house and set up a screen and a projector.
sentences.cn: 我们的主人从那所房子里牵出了一条长的延长导线，安置了一块屏幕和一个投影仪。

sentences.en: A projector shines a map of the vein network directly on the skin.
sentences.cn: 投影仪将静脉网络的分布图直接投射到皮肤上。

sentences.en: A desktop computer, screen, projector, and loudspeakers will be available.
sentences.cn: 将提供台式计算机、屏幕、投影仪和扬声器。
